title: Name change?
body: Can you help me change my name, I get harassed because its a childish name and it makes me not want to play league as much. since I don't play as much I cant afford a name change in influence points. Please help

replies.body: I think your name is pretty solid, and if anyone is harassing you in game I highly recommend muting them.  You can also use the reporting tool in-game if they're really getting overboard with it.  We can't provide a name change, but you can purchase one through the in-game store.  Hope that helps!
